name: VIRUS ATTACK! (newcube)
description:
VIRUS ATTACK!

Save the world from the Alien Virus! 

  • Destroy the invading aliens by blasting the Spreaders
  • Infected land spawn Turrets!
  • Don't let Turrets turn in to Mega Turrets!  
  • The virus destroys the cities - don't let it touch them!
  • When Spreaders are destroyed, their Virus is too - and so are any spawned Turrets!
  • Pickup Health, Shields, Weapon upgrades and Nukes to help win the war!

Created for LowRezJam 2020
